entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
